channel.title: PhotoShop Renders
channel.description:
I am new to photoshop and these might not be as good I would just like to share, I am never on moparisthebest you usually see me on moparisthebest.com/smf so I am going to get into the habit of going on moparisthebest, please vote which one you most like.
Number 1:
[img]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x157/gaymasteroflord/RainHalofunAnim.gif[/img]
Number 2:
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x157/gaymasteroflord/RainHaloAnimation.gif[/img]
Number 3:
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x157/gaymasteroflord/W00tSc4p3CommBanner-1.gif[/img]
Number 4:
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x157/gaymasteroflord/Untitled-12.gif[/img]
Number 5:
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x157/gaymasteroflord/godofikipwn.gif[/img]
See there not as good, but I am new to photoshop and some people are faster learners, I just started yesterday, please vote!

item.title: PhotoShop Renders
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Dude…!! Animations aren’t renders!! Even if we tried, the .gif format would only give away the first frame of the animation…

RENDER

C4D

Read full topic

item.title: PhotoShop Renders
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Stop the animation.

[quote=“dragonchain, post:3, topic:167497”]Thanks that’s what I was looking for, and some people are faster learnings then me, and I am just saying there are renders I used, what I meant to say.

I am making more and this time they will have different fonts.[/quote]

We can tell by your great grammar…

Read full topic

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

exps35:

Also, try not to reference to runescape moparscape in EVERYTHING you do. They’re both quite retarded.

item.title: PhotoShop Renders
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

A render is the image you cut out BY ITSELF on a transparent background.

And over here, people don’t really make polls too often. Also, try not to reference to runescape in EVERYTHING you do. They’re both quite retarded.

Trying to help you avoid as much flame as possible, because frankly this stuff sucks. Bawls.

Read full topic

item.title: PhotoShop Renders
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:2, topic:167497”]These aren’t renders.

The rain looks sorta cool, then you realize it’s just two frames alternating.

The fonts are atrocious.

You used the same render for 3/5 sigs (?).[/quote]Thanks that’s what I was looking for, and some people are faster learnings then me, and I am just saying there are renders I used, what I meant to say.

I am making more and this time they will have different fonts.

Read full topic
